name: Carrot
watering_notes: Soil surface should always be moist up to 5cm deep
Water at least once a week
fertilizing_notes: Fertilize soil before planting or repotting
Only fertilize once or twice during growth
Do not fertilize during stressful periods
pruning_notes: Harvested before any pruning is required
additional_notes: Should be planted about 2 weeks before the last frost of the year
